required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Hybrid APC for Gastric Low Grade Intraepithelial Neoplasia
clinical_study.official_title: HybridAPC for the Treatment of Gastric Low Grade Intraepithelial Neoplasia (LGIN): a Prospective, Multi-center Study

collaborator.agency: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University
Shenzhen Hospital of Southern Medical University
The Fifth Affiliated Hospital of Zunyi Medical University, Zhuhai, China

brief_summary.textblock: This cohort study aims to investigate the clinical efficacy and safety of Hybrid APC for treatment of gastric low grade intramucosal neoplasia.

detailed_description.textblock: This cohort study aims to investigate the clinical efficacy and safety of Hybrid APC for treatment of gastric low grade intramucosal neoplasia. Successful ablation is defined as no evidence of local recurrence at 12 months after HybridAPC upon follow up endoscopy. This is defined as absence of LGIN, HGIN and cancer in biopsies obtained at all locations during followup endoscopy.

primary_outcome.measure: Complete ablation of gastric low grade intraepithelial neoplasia
primary_outcome.description: Successful ablation is defined as no evidence of local recurrence at 12 months after HybridAPC upon follow up endoscopy. This is defined as absence of LGIN, HGIN and cancer in biopsies obtained at all locations during followup endoscopy.

secondary_outcome.description: Bleeding during the procedure as defined by Grade Definition 0 No bleeding Less bleeding, could be auto-stopped or used by HibridAPC Stop bleeding by using hot forceps Stop bleeding by using clips
Pain after the procedure as defined by pain score Grade Definition 0 No pain, I Slight pain, II Moderate pain, III Severe pain, IV Extreme pain. V Unbearable pain
Development of new neoplasia including low grade intraepithelial neoplasia, high grade intraepithelial neoplasia and advanced gastric cancers

secondary_outcome.measure: Progression of Low grade intraepithelial neoplasia
secondary_outcome.description: Progression of the development of low grade intraepithelial neoplasia to high grade intraepithelial neoplasia or advanced gastric cancer
Development of postoperative complications including bleeding and perforation

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of HybridAPC procedures required for treatment
secondary_outcome.description: The number of Hybrid Argon Plasma Coagulation performed for complete ablation

arm_group.description: The Hybrid-Argon Plasma Coagulation probe combines waterjet technology with Argon Plasma Coagulation. The probe comprises a central water channel for the submucosa injection function and a peripheral gas channel for the Argon Plasma Coagulation function

intervention.description: Argon Plasma Coagulation after water injection for local ablation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Low grade intraepithelial neoplasia of stomach with sizeâ‰¤20 mm
2. Endoscopic diagnosis suspected gastric LGIN with biopsy confirmed gastric LGIN
3. Endoscopic appearance according to Paris classification of Type 0-IIa, IIb or IIc
4. Patients with informed consent
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Patients who had previous endoscopic treatment (including APC, EMR, ESD) for gastric LGIN, HGIN or gastric carcinoma.
2. Endoscopic evidence of ulcer
3. Biopsy confirmed HGIN
4. Endoscopic diagnosis suspected HGIN while biopsy confirmed LGIN
5. Pregnancy
6. informed consent not available

facility.name: Combined Endoscopy Center, Prince of Wales Hospital
